page.title: 12FETES
page.content: FETES High Hurstwood Fete. High Hurstwood Fete was held on Saturday June 29 th 1985 to raise money for the Church. There was dog show and an obedience show. There was a tombola and a treasure hunt, but there was not a tug of war team as last year. The Flower Festival at St Margaret the Queen. Last week class one girls of Buxted School arranged flowers for the festival at the Church. On Friday we went up to the Church for a short service. Afterwards a reporter from the Sussex Express asked Mr Manners if he could take a photo of us. The festival had a theme of peace.
